scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Additional papers of Jorge Luis Borges including 4 autograph manuscripts: "Juderia," 1920, with corrections made in 1943; "Ciudad," 1920, with correcions made in 1943; "Calle desconocida," 1920, with corrections made in 1943; and "Plaza San Martin," n.d. with a drawing by Attilio Rossi. An autograph letter from Borges to Rossi accompanies the "Plaza San Martin" manuscript.

scopecontent.p: Poem by Jorge Luis Borges, with small drawing of a Menorah at the bottom of the page by the author. Revised and signed Borges in 1922. Re-titled Judengasseand revised in 1943 by the author.
